meta.site_description: Official website of the Mali Taekwondo Federation. Discover news, events, athletes and Taekwondo clubs in Mali.

footer.description: Malian Taekwondo Federation – Promoting and developing Taekwondo in Mali with excellence and integrity.

hero.title: Malian Taekwondo Federation
hero.subtitle: Promote and develop Taekwondo in Mali with excellence and integrity

features.title: Our Mission
features.subtitle: Develop Taekwondo in Mali by offering training, competition, and personal development opportunities at all levels.

formation.title: Training
formation.desc: Training programs for athletes, coaches, and referees of all levels.

competitions.title: Competitions
competitions.desc: Organization of national tournaments and participation in international competitions.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Bring together the Malian Taekwondo community and promote the values of the sport.

cta.title: Join the FEMAT family
cta.subtitle: Whether you are a beginner or expert, young or old, there is a place for you in our community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: At FEMAT, we're here to support all of our members. Whether you have questions about membership, events, training programs, or anything else, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.address: Fédération Malienne de Taekwondo Palais des Sports, ACI 2000 Bamako, Mali
contact.stay_connected: Stay connected and follow us on social media for updates, events, and highlights.

about.title: About FEMAT
about.history_text: The Fédération Malienne de Taekwondo (FEMAT) was founded to promote and develop Taekwondo in Mali. Over the years, it has grown into a vibrant community of athletes, coaches, and clubs across the country.
about.mission_text: FEMAT's mission is to foster excellence in Taekwondo, support athletes at all levels, and represent Mali in national and international competitions.
about.structure_text: The federation is organized with a board of directors, various commissions, and affiliated clubs throughout Mali, ensuring effective governance and support for the sport.

not_found.title: Article not found
not_found.description: The news article you are looking for does not exist.

not_found.title: Event not found
not_found.description: The event you are looking for does not exist.

error.title: We can't seem to find the page you are looking for.
error.message: We apologize, but the page you are trying to access cannot be found. It may have been moved, renamed, or deleted. Please check the URL for any errors, or try searching for the page using the navigation menu or go back to the home page. Thank you for your understanding.
